comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

There is indeed a layout problem but I tend to think it's a site design issue. 

Problem with Firefox: buttons of the top do not see well. 
Problem with Safari: buttons show well, but do not work at all. 
Problem with IE: buttons of the top do not see well. 

Please also try these situations see if you can confirm all the above. 
Thanks!
comments.raw_text:
